docs.text: mkdocs-docker mkdocs bundled in Docker image Usage in pipeline docker run -it --rm -v $PWD:/src -w /src -u $(id -u ${USER}):$(id -g ${USER}) g0lden/mkdocs mkdocs build Example of pipeline with Travis: https://travis-ci.com/DG0lden/mkdocs-docker Example of docs deployment in Github pages https://github.com/DG0lden/mkdocs-demo Documentation on ReadTheDocs https://mkdocs-docker.readthedocs.io/ Available tools Mkdocs Plantuml
